title: Geometric sans with extras on certain letters?
content:
Unfortunately I only have a small sample of type to go from here. I've definitely seen this before, but I can't put my finger on it. No helpful context either, sorry. Any ideas?

Thanks,  
Pat

comments.content:
Looks like a pretty close alternative. I don't really need an exact fit, so Insignia might just do the job. Thanks!

Still curious though...
